record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - January 23, 2008)

[Page: H407]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, on Wednesday, January 23, 2008, I was unable to vote on rollcall 21 and 22 due to unavoidable circumstances. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" for both votes.

record.chair: The veto message and the bill will be referred to the Committees on Energy and Commerce and Ways and Means.
record.narrative: The Clerk will notify the Senate of the action of the House.
